name: Texel.ai
headline: Run AI pipelines 10x faster
description: Texel is a platform that enables developers to generate hardware-accelerated APIs for running AI pipelines 10 times faster, including image and video applications. For example, developers can use the latest NVIDIA GPUs or Google TPUs without having to become hardware experts themselves.

founders.name: Rahul Sheth, Founder
founders.description: Rahul is co-founder and CEO of Texel.ai. He worked on Bitmoji at Snapchat for almost 8 years after completing a Computer Science PhD at Stanford in character animation and physics simulation. He is interested in scalable systems for computer graphics and artificial intelligence.

founders.name: Eli Semory, Founder
founders.description: Eli is the Co-founder and CTO of Texel.ai. He worked at Snapchat for the last 5 years, building one of the worlds largest graphics GPU deployments. At Texel.ai he's solving the next big problems in Generative AI enabling new and exciting large scale applications.

# Process Videos at Scale with AI
Edit videos with easy-to-use APIs. Keep users engaged with low processing times.
[Get In Touch](https://texel.ai/</contact>)
##### Upload in progress...
Your video file is being uploaded. The currently loaded video is the source file.
Automatic Eye Contact Correction
### Over 2 million videos processed each month
[![Captions](https://texel.ai/captions.svg)](https://texel.ai/<https:/captions.ai>)
[![Kapwing](https://texel.ai/kapwing.png)](https://texel.ai/<https:/kapwing.com>)
[![Switchboard](https://texel.ai/switchboard.svg)](https://texel.ai/<https:/switchboard.app>)
[![nVIDIA](https://texel.ai/Nvidia_logo.svg)](https://texel.ai/<https:/nvidia.com>)
[![YCombinator](https://texel.ai/YCombinatorBW.svg)](https://texel.ai/<https:/ycombinator.com>)
# Fast and cost-effective
Our video pipeline APIs have best-in-class performance due to extensive optimizations. Optimized pipelines mean faster processing, which also means lower costs.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%273000%27%20height=%272000%27/%3e)![Fast and cost-effective](https://texel.ai)
# Customizable
Customize our video pipelines to your needs from our basic building blocks. We provide direct support to make sure we power your project the way you want.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%273000%27%20height=%272000%27/%3e)![Customizable](https://texel.ai)
# Experienced
The Texel team has over three decades of experience in graphics, rendering, and video.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%274288%27%20height=%272848%27/%3e)![Experienced](https://texel.ai)
# Pricing
Each API has its own simple pricing. Pay-as-you-go with usage based plans.
##### Enterprise
  * A custom plan with pricing tailored to your specific business needs
  * Access to beta features
  * Bring your own models
  * On-demand support


[Contact Us](https://texel.ai/</contact>)

generated_description:
Texel.ai, founded in 2023, is a startup on a mission to supercharge AI workflows by running AI pipelines 10x faster. Initially launched as Texel, the platform is designed for developers to create hardware-accelerated APIs, making it easier to utilize advanced GPUs like NVIDIA or TPUs from Google without the steep learning curve that usually comes with hardware expertise.

Based in [Y Combinator's Batch W23](https://texel.ai), Texel.ai is a lean operation, currently powered by a small team of just two people, but they’re brimming with ambition. Under the guidance of Group Partner Brad Flora, the company is set to revolutionize the way developers process images and videos at scale.

What’s fascinating about Texel.ai is its focus on efficiency. The company claims to process over 2 million videos each month, which is no small feat. They pride themselves on fast and cost-effective APIs that optimize video editing tools, enabling quick turnaround times that keep users engaged. This is especially attractive for developers looking to minimize costs while maximizing performance.

But it’s not just about speed. Texel.ai offers customizable video pipeline solutions that can be tailored to the specific needs of a project, along with direct support for users. Their pricing model is also straightforward, offering a pay-as-you-go structure that's flexible for different scales of usage—and they’re open to custom enterprise solutions too.

With a deep bench of experience in graphics, rendering, and video that spans over three decades, Texel.ai is well poised to meet the demands of modern developers. If you’re looking to optimize your AI pipeline workflow, or simply want to learn more, you can check them out at their [website](https://texel.ai).

In summary, Texel.ai positions itself as an essential tool for developers eager to harness the power of AI with simplicity and speed, all while keeping costs in check. The future is fast, and Texel.ai is here to help you keep pace.
